channel.title: [Pi] Adding Jail message
channel.description: I'm new to java coding and I need a little help. I don't wanna be spoonfed but I still would like to be helped on adding a global/server message that tells everyone thats on my server that a player has been jailed/muted/unmuted/banned/ipbanned/unipbanned. Please and thanks

item.title: [Pi] Adding Jail message
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Take the yell method and use it as a method to yell to the server…

Read full topic
